"A.P.241/10/15 11:30": "Welcome back, you two. Thanks to your efforts, we suffered minimal damage."
"But, Xiao. Those Darkers were..."
"We were gathering data here too. Looking at these readings, it's clear that the Darkers are being strengthened."
"The question is, why..."
"1. They're being influenced by Omega?"
"2. You've figured out a reason?"
"I cannot be certain yet, however that is a possibility we cannot ignore."
"We do not understand it yet, but I think I may be on to something."
"Could it be... the influence of Omega?"
"Our calculations do show a correlation between the Black Hole's expansion and the Darkers growing stronger."
"I guess when the Black Hole absorbs more worlds, isn't it as if the [Profound Darkness] is consuming them?"
"If we say that the [Profound Darkness] consumes what the Black Hole absorbs, it doesn't sound so far-fetched."
"The [Profound Darkness] corrupts all things, no matter their nature."
"As it consumes the food that the Black Hole sucks in, it gets stronger and stronger."
"And that also affects its children, the Darkers..."
"The situation is worse than we thought."
"The energy being absorbed by the Black Hole is huge. We won't be able to handle it."
"But before that... We first have to deal with Omega."
"The Influence"
"There's This World, There's That World"
